CustomField.description: Shows the current local time (without date) for the Lead in 24-hr format.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(tz__UTF_Offset__c), "Unknown", MID( TEXT( NOW()+ tz__UTF_Offset__c /24 ), 12, 2 ) &":"& MID( TEXT( NOW()+ tz__UTF_Offset__c /24 ), 15, 2 ) & " " & IF( $Setup.tz__lt_app_settings__c.tz__Abbreviation__c, tz__Timezone__c,"") )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Shows the local time (without date) for the Lead in 24-hr format.
CustomField.label: Local Time
